WWW_AUTHOR_BIO: Madino Žderić is the Principal Design Strategist at "VisioSafe Systems," a leading consultancy firm specializing in ergonomic and cognitive design for public safety signage. With over 15 years of experience, Madino has been instrumental in developing new visual standards for emergency and informational signage across various EU-funded infrastructure projects.
